results.title: Short term monotherapy with GLP-1 receptor agonist liraglutide or PDE 4 inhibitor roflumilast is superior to metformin in weight loss in obese PCOS women: a pilot randomized study

citations.NLM: Jensterle M, Salamun V, Kocjan T, Vrtacnik Bokal E, Janez A. Short term monotherapy with GLP-1 receptor agonist liraglutide or PDE 4 inhibitor roflumilast is superior to metformin in weight loss in obese PCOS women: a pilot randomized study J Ovarian Res. 2015 Jun 2;8():32. PMID: 26032655

results.title: Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine.
results.text_hl: At the first appointment, the majority of clients had @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@ that was mostly left untreated; many of these clients were commenced on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. The outcomes are positive, and show that the majority of clients lost weight (82.5%) and had a @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ in @DISEASE_MASS_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@body mass@@@ index (84.6%); nearly half (44.4%) had a @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ in waist @<m>DISEASE_Abidi_X_linked_mental_retardation_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535556 @@@circumference@@@.

citations.NLM: Coates D, Woodford P, Higgins O, Grover D. Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine. Int J Ment Health Nurs. 2018 Feb;27(1):303-310. PMID: 28233407
citations.BibTeX: @article{28233407, title={Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine.}, author={Coates D and Woodford P and Higgins O and Grover D}, journal={Int J Ment Health Nurs}, volume={27}, number={1}, pages={303-310}}
